p: In Espírito Santo state, Brazil, this vector has been reported since the 1980s, with a broad dispersion in its territory, mainly in areas with underbrush [ 26]. Ports of this state were presumed as the first entry places of A. albopictus in Brazil [ 13, 27]. There, 73,998-suspected cases and 37 deaths by DENV infection were reported in 2019 until the 39° epidemiological week, and 1,055 registers of ZIKV were made in the same period [ 28].
